antibody.description: An immunoglobulin complex that is secreted into extracellular space and found in mucosal areas or other tissues or circulating in the blood or lymph

antibodyAmount.description: Amount of antibody used for an assay

antibodyAmountUnits.description: Units of measure for the amount of antibody used for an assay

catalogNumber.description: The identifier assigned to a product, usually in the list of products published by a reseller or manufacturer

chromatinAmount.description: Amount in ug of chromatin used for an assay

lotNumber.description: A distinctive alpha-numeric identification code assigned by the manufacturer or distributor to a specific quantity of manufactured material or product within a batch

vendor.description: Commercial or institutional source of a component used in an assay
